# SMSService.Error.permanentFailure

**Case**

The operation failed permanently.

## Declaration

```swift
case permanentFailure
```

## Identifying errors

- **SMSService.Error.notSupported**: The operation isn’t supported.
- **SMSService.Error.temporaryFailure**: The operation failed temporarily.
- **SMSService.Error.unknown**: An unknown problem caused the error.

items.description: An unknown problem caused the error.
items.name: SMSService.Error.unknown
